mapper.select: SELECT id, room_number, is_special, capacity FROM classrooms WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT c.id FROM classrooms c JOIN subjects s ON s.id = #{subjectId} LEFT JOIN special_classrooms sc ON sc.subject_id = s.id WHERE (s.requires_special_room = FALSE AND c.is_special = FALSE) OR (s.requires_special_room = TRUE AND c.id = sc.classroom_id) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 1;
SELECT id, room_number, is_special, capacity FROM classrooms ORDER BY id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO classrooms (room_number, is_special, capacity) VALUES (#{roomNumber}, #{isSpecial}, #{capacity})
